      • createGround

        public Square[][] createGround(java.lang.String selectedLeftMap,
                               java.lang.String selectedRightMap)
        it creates ground and sets spawn square following the schema present in the resource Json
        Parameters:
        selectedLeftMap - choice of the first part(left)
        selectedRightMap - choice of the second part(right)
        Returns:
        the created map as a Square matrix
